p.s: In the following I am going to summarize the given sequence from the movie The Hate U Give directed by George Tillmann Jr., published in 2018, it's about a black teenage girl named Starr who has to switch between her two worlds; the poor black neighbourhood where she lives and the fancy suburban prep school she attends.

The scene begins with Starr's family sitting in a diner, praying before they start eating, till Starr looks outside of the window and sees King standing in front of a big car watching her and her family with two other gang members.

Maverick then realizes what's going on and goes outside very fast, he starts pushing King after he said something against Starr, they are having a little fight, till suddenly the police comes, so King and his gang members are driving ofoff.
Two police officers walk towards him with their hands already on their guns, the one is white and the other one is black.
The police officers start pushing him against the window where Starr and the others are sitting on the other side of it.
They ask for his IDidentification, so Lisa comes out to show it to them, the others follow her, they won't go back in, even after the police officers command them to.

The next thing that's happening is the black police officer pushing Maverick on the ground, Starr takes her phone out to film everything, she and the black officer then have intense eye contact while he realises that she is the whitnesswitness, there is already a crowd of people watching and filming what is happening around them.
The police officer starts letting go of Maverick, they are threatening him to see this as a warning and then drive off.
Lisa makes sure everyone is okay, in the end one can see Starr's little brother Sekhani crying.
